      • sendNewIni

        public static void sendNewIni(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String text,
              java.lang.String targetID,
              Account author)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              IllegalFormatException,
                              KeyException,
                              VerificationException
        Send a request to create a new Ini to the Server
        Parameters:
        name - the name to create the Ini with
        text - the text to create the Ini with
        targetID - the Topic to create the Ini in. If targetID == "new", create in new Topic
        author - the Account to sign the Message with
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        IllegalFormatException
        KeyException
        VerificationException
